name: no. 004 - THE BRIDE
description:
ON DEATH, LIFE AND WHATNOTS trading card is a collectible series made by Feransis using his artworks and things he learned from the internet. The subjects on these cards are stuff that he often thinks  about in everyday life.

For this OCTOBER 2021 series, he picks 12 subjects that can feel scary, evil, disgusting and monstrous.

OCTOBER 2021 series contains 9 regular type cards, 2 rare type cards and 1 ultra rare type card.

All the unsold cards will be burned in blockchain hell in 2 days (approx. 48 hours).
